scripts.build:all: npm run build:dva && npm run build:utility
scripts.postclean:all: rimraf ./package-lock.json && npm run clean:cli && npm run clean:utility && npm run clean:dva && npm run clean:rollup && rimraf ./node_modules
scripts.lerna:b: husky install && git pull && pnpm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:all:fix: npm run lint:cli:fix && npm run lint:utility:fix && npm run lint:dva:fix
scripts.ncu:all: ncu && npm run ncu:rollup && npm run ncu:cli && npm run ncu:dva && npm run ncu:utility
scripts.ncu:u:all: ncu -u && npm run ncu:u:rollup && npm run ncu:u:cli && npm run ncu:u:dva && npm run ncu:u:utility
scripts.prepublish-npm-all: echo change nrm use npm && nrm use npm && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.publish-npm-all: nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-all && nrm use local && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.postpublish-npm-all: echo change nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.prepublish-npm-cli: echo change nrm use npm && nrm use npm && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.publish-npm-cli: nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-cli && nrm use local && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.postpublish-npm-cli: echo change nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.prepublish-npm-dva: echo change nrm use npm && nrm use npm && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.publish-npm-dva: nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-dva && nrm use local && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.postpublish-npm-dva: echo change nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.prepublish-npm-utility: echo change nrm use npm && nrm use npm && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.publish-npm-utility: nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-utility && nrm use local && npx sleepms 2000
scripts.postpublish-npm-utility: echo change nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.prepublish:build: npm run cz && npm run build:all
scripts.publish:npm-all: npm run publish:npm-utility-only && npm run publish:npm-dva-only && npm run publish:npm-cli-only
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm run lerna:b
